name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】DISASTERSHOW ｜｜ Disasterpiece Release Mini Show! ｜｜ Mori Calliope #disastershow #calliolive [fuQ7VpAVFr4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: A cinematic teaser compilation showcasing the tracks from Mori Calliope's album 'Disasterpiece'.
Atmospheric transition into the live show venue, set in an apocalyptic wasteland cathedral.
Mori Calliope opens the show with an energetic greeting to her audience followed by a dramatic introduction.
Live performance of the song 'DISASTER' from the album 'Disasterpiece'.

subtitles.original:
Seems time's a-wastin'
Show me what you really wanna do
subtitles.english:
Seems time's a-wastin'
Show me what you really wanna do

subtitles.original:
Tonight's my turn to show ya
how obvious I can be
subtitles.english:
Tonight's my turn to show ya
how obvious I can be

subtitles.original:
Sometimes it feels like you're playing
a game of me and only me
subtitles.english:
Sometimes it feels like you're playing
a game of me and only me

subtitles.original:
Looks so, so predictable,
they can see what I can see, go, go, go!
subtitles.english:
Looks so, so predictable,
they can see what I can see, go, go, go!

subtitles.original:
Get back! Just crash!
吐き溜めた希望を...
subtitles.english:
Get back! Just crash!
The hope I've vomited out...

subtitles.original:
Let's just crash!
飛び火していくんだ...
subtitles.english:
Let's just crash!
It's spreading like wildfire...

subtitles.original:
不鮮明な情けない世界で
空白重ねた光
subtitles.english:
In a blurred and pathetic world,
light layered upon emptiness

subtitles.original:
脈打つ鼓動 誰にもなれない
言葉を紡いでる
subtitles.english:
A pulsing heartbeat, spinning words
that no one else can become

subtitles.original:
Under the black / We fall, we break
We drown in fire / Lost inside this dark desire
subtitles.english:
Under the black / We fall, we break
We drown in fire / Lost inside this dark desire

subtitles.original: 去ろう、焦がす、未来の Mercy / Mercy
subtitles.english: Let's leave, scorching the future's Mercy / Mercy

subtitles.original: 見ろ 何もしない 最高潮の愛に
subtitles.english:
Look, at a love that does nothing
and reaches its peak

subtitles.original:
雲立って / Tell me what I'm not to say
What's your problem?
subtitles.english:
Clouds rise / Tell me what I'm not to say
What's your problem?

subtitles.original: 夜をひとり あたしが迷う
subtitles.english: Alone in the night, I wander

subtitles.original:
When the thunder crashes down / When the world
caves under my pressure, there'll be no one to save
subtitles.english:
When the thunder crashes down / When the world
caves under my pressure, there'll be no one to save

subtitles.original:
巡る巡る 運命に逆らって
出会い 思いを通わせた
subtitles.english:
Going 'round and 'round, defying fate,
we met and shared our feelings

subtitles.original:
These strangers I followed
with stars in their eyes
subtitles.english:
These strangers I followed
with stars in their eyes

subtitles.original:
Don't keep on waiting, wanting, faking
You're someone you're not reaching, longing, changing
subtitles.english:
Don't keep on waiting, wanting, faking
You're someone you're not reaching, longing, changing

subtitles.original:
I can't be someone else / Despite it all
my mind has become my hell / With no escape or hope
subtitles.english:
I can't be someone else / Despite it all
my mind has become my hell / With no escape or hope

subtitles.original:
くらくらしちゃうでしょ
くらくらしちゃうでしょ
subtitles.english:
It'll make you dizzy, right?
It'll make you dizzy, right?

subtitles.original:
ほらほら遠くそう
そうでしょ Flash bang!
subtitles.english:
Look, look, it's far away
That's right, Flash bang!

subtitles.original:
In this moment / Maybe I jumped the map
Not knowing if I never try
subtitles.english:
In this moment / Maybe I jumped the map
Not knowing if I never try

subtitles.original:
昨日の夢を見るたびに
生まれた意味を考えてしまうの
subtitles.english:
Every time I dream of yesterday,
I end up thinking about the meaning of my birth

subtitles.original: ああ 美しい 青い...
subtitles.english: Ah, beautiful, blue...

subtitles.original:
We fall, we break / We drown in fire
Lost inside this dark desire / No love, no fate
subtitles.english:
We fall, we break / We drown in fire
Lost inside this dark desire / No love, no fate

subtitles.original: What's up all you deadbeats!
subtitles.english: What's up all you deadbeats!

subtitles.original: Welcome to Disasterpiece Release...!
subtitles.english: Welcome to Disasterpiece Release...!

subtitles.original: ようこそ！
subtitles.english: Welcome!

subtitles.original: たくさん楽しもうね！
subtitles.english: Let's have a lot of fun!

subtitles.original: Let's go! Come on!
subtitles.english: Let's go! Come on!

subtitles.original:
Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!
Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!
subtitles.english:
Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!
Hey! Hey! Hey! Hey!

subtitles.original: Ha! You got eyes but you don't look or listen.
subtitles.english: Ha! You got eyes but you don't look or listen.

subtitles.original: In other words, you're useless every last one of you.
subtitles.english: In other words, you're useless every last one of you.

subtitles.original: And that's why I'm gonna send you all to Hell!
subtitles.english: And that's why I'm gonna send you all to Hell!

subtitles.original: All of humanity!
subtitles.english: All of humanity!

subtitles.original: 全容 察した 閉じ全容 善兵 投げて
subtitles.english:
I sensed the whole picture, closed it,
threw all my pieces in

subtitles.original:
I'm just the type you forget,
so don't waste your time, yeah
subtitles.english:
I'm just the type you forget,
so don't waste your time, yeah

subtitles.original:
契り 崩れ 賭けのチェイン 狂いそう
Somebody's gotta pay
subtitles.english:
Bonds crumble, a chain of bets,
I'm going crazy, somebody's gotta pay
